name: webtask-webpack-plugin
description: Webpack Plugin to exclude form the bundle dependencies provided by http://webtask.io environment

scripts.examples: webpack --config examples/native-modules/webpack.config.js & webpack --config examples/loose-matching/webpack.config.js & webpack --config examples/strict-matching/webpack.config.js & webpack --config examples/dependency-matching/webpack.config.js  & webpack --config examples/throw-unavailable/webpack.config.js

author: crigot@hotmail.com
